description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience YOUR music collection as never before with this intense music driven arcade shooter.  Ultra adds all new bad guys, bosses, weapons, perks and game modes! Also includes co-op and head to head online play!  Blast away to your favorite tracks. Watch your firepower pulse to the energy of the music.  ★ 100% - 'Must own for action gamers' ★ 100% - 'Must Have'
